problem_text_cn: 如图,有点光源S在平面镜上方,若在P点看到点光源的反射光线,并测得AB=10cm,BC=20cm,PC⊥AC,且PC=24cm,点光源S到平面镜的距离即SA的长度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the vertex light source S is above the plane mirror. If you see the reflected light of the vertex light source at vertex P, and measure AB = N_0, BC = N_1, PC ⊥ AC, and PC = N_2, the distance from the vertex light source S to the plane mirror is that The length of SA is ()
raw_answer:
解:根据题意,∵∠1=∠2,∠SAB=∠PCB,∴△SAB∽△PBC,
即\frac{SA}{PC}=\frac{AB}{BC},故SA=\frac{AB}{BC}×PC=24×\frac{1}{2}=12．
故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查相似三角形性质的应用．解题时关键是找出相似的三角形,然后根据对应边成比例列出方程,建立适当的数学模型来解决问题．
